entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Internet 2000. Computer use and level of internet-supply of the population in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E17: TÁRKI Internet 2000. Computer use and level of internet-supply of the population in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Tarjányi, József
entry.dcterms:description: being supplied with computer and supplements, computer use, internet access, internet use, cable television, telephoning, expenditures
entry.dcterms:subject: science and technology
economic conditions and indicators
information society
mass media
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage stratified sample. The prevalence of internet access in the population was examined on a random sample of 1504 urban telephone subscribers. The characteristics of internet subscribers was given by a 558-person sample.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: Out of the entire case number, the individual sample (1504 cases) can be separated by using the filter SELECT IF IMINTA = 1.
SPSS portable datafile

Hungarian questionnaire
Hungarian documentation
English questionnaire
